content:
Hello folks! :wave: This is Pranav. I am a full stack web developer, but have always been interested by core technologies and languages. To pursue this interest further, I've decided to contribute to my favourite language :) . I hope to learn a lot from the experienced developers here as well.
I've started reading the rustc-dev-guide, and although its very well-written. The whole Rust project seems overwhelming :sweat_smile: .
I plan to continue working on the guide for the next week or so. In the meantime, please let me know if there are some simple issues I can start picking up.
Apart from the guide, are there any other tips or suggestions you guys have to get me onboarded and skilled enough to make my first contribution quickly?
